      • getWidth

        public float getWidth()
        Returns:
        Returns the actual width of the tvg including scale.

      • getHeight

        public float getHeight()
        Returns:
        Returns the actual height of the tvg including scale.

      • getHeader

        public TinyVGHeader getHeader()
        Each TVG file starts with a header defining some global values for the file like scale and image size.

      • getColorTable

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color[] getColorTable()
        The color table encodes the palette for this file. It’s binary content is defined by the color_encoding field in the header. For the three defined color encodings, each will yield a list of color_count RGBA tuples.

      • getCommands

        public com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<Command> getCommands()
        TinyVG files contain a sequence of draw commands that must be executed in the defined order to get the final result. Each draw command adds a new 2D primitive to the graphic.

      • getPositionX

        public float getPositionX()
        Global position offset value.

      • getPositionY

        public float getPositionY()

      • getScaleX

        public float getScaleX()
        Global scale value.

      • getScaleY

        public float getScaleY()

      • getLineWidthScale

        public float getLineWidthScale()
        Global scale value for all line widths. (Independent from scale)

      • setLineWidthScale

        public void setLineWidthScale(float lineWidthScale)
        Global scale value for all line widths. (Independent from scale)

      • getCurvePoints

        public int getCurvePoints()
        Amount of points every curve generates.

      • isDirty

        public boolean isDirty()
        Next time render gets called and the tvg is dirty, it recalculates all point positions in paths.
